resources.string: Please Enter the OTP Sent to you
OTP has been sent to your mobile number
From here you can easily view society residents and manage your committee.
You will easily find staffs and workers who provide help from here.
Here you will find all quarantine statuses and all people\'s vacation statuses in your society
All emergency number of your society you will find here
Raised your all complaints and message to society from here
Book your facilities and services from here which you need
